Ad Astra

Tell Me More

Future Goals

We can't wait to see what our teams become.

Expand Membership

We aim to grow our club membership, welcoming diverse youth from all backgrounds and skill levels.

Community Engagement

We plan to engage more with our local community through public demonstrations, robotics competitions, and collaboration with local schools and organizations.

Enhance Learning Experience

We strive to continually improve and expand our curriculum, incorporating cutting-edge technology and real-world applications of robotics.

Foster Mentorship

We aspire to create a mentorship program where experienced members can guide newer members, fostering a culture of collaboration and shared learning.

Secure Funding

We aim to secure stable funding through grants, donations, and sponsorships to provide our members with the best resources and opportunities.

STEM Advocacy

We seek to use our platform to advocate for increased emphasis on STEM education.
